title: Emi nAtO vAta
sahitya:
Emi nAtO vAta mA shivakAmasundari nEDu


anupallavi

  shyAma rAma bhajini nIvE nAma balku tilaku namma
nA moralu vina rAdA (ammA) nA mukhamu cUDa rAdA


caraNam    manasulOni ninnu peTTi dina dinamu kolicitivai 
guNavati nIvE gatiyeni kusumatena cEsitini
nIta gItam pADitini nIvE sharaNam koNTini
nApai kOpavELa dEvI shrI rAjapUjitE
